body_html:
Yes, I think this is a temporary fix for the RoCE folks to be able to use Infiniband.

@shamoya is working on a better version with rdmacm, which is smart enough to set the network parameters automatically and properly. I assume that end users, especially those unfamiliar with hardware, would rather not tweak the network parameters, unless the goal is benchmarking.
